div.p: SO I MODIFIED IT. FINALLY THE FACTOR TIP OF THE
DAY. ANOTHER WEBSITE THAT CAN SAVE
YOU MONEY. WHEN I BUY SOMETHING I’M ALWAYS
THINKING IF I WOULD HAVE GOTTEN A BETTER DEAL SOMEWHERE ELSE.
I BET YOU DO IT, TOO. FIRST, BIZRATE.COM.
TELL THEM WHAT YOU WANT TO BUY. THEY POP UP PRICES FROM A
VARIETY OF SELLERS. PRICEGRABBER.COM DOES IT AS
WELL. EVEN I FIGURED THAT OUT.
FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY. THAT’S IT FOR US TONIGHT.
CHECK OUT THE FOX NEWS FACTOR WEBSITE.
SPOUT OFF ABOUT THE FACTOR. NAME AND TOWN IF YOU WISH TO OH
